item.author: sally@recordssoundthesame.com (Sally Lait)
item.description: I originally started out agency-side as a back-end developer, before I moved into the management of the development team in a technical/solutions architect role, ending up at Head of Technology level. James Sarre, Head of Production at LightmakerOn starting my self-employed journey I originally worked in technical discovery-centric roles as contracts (agencies, and one project for SSE alongside Accenture), but then worked to gain a roster of my own clients. Some that I’m proud of (and able to talk about!
